arts.ttl: Rodgers should have realised that Tynecastle was no place for rookies
arts.sum: Absolute shambles, this one is on Brendan Rodgers, as it was last week. Fail to beat Falkirk, and questions will be getting asked about his job. In fact it’s already started… For the second Sunday on a trot we suffered a defeat to leave us trailing today’s opponent Hearts by eight points, and yet again Read More

arts.ttl: No 'statement win' for McInnes as Rodgers wants 'perspective'
arts.sum: There is something special happening at Hearts, the question is can Celtic or any other team stop their title hopes?

arts.ttl: Hearts underlines title threat in Scotland by beating Celtic to move 8 points clear
arts.sum: The 40-year dominance of Glasgow giants Celtic and Rangers in Scottish soccer looks to be in serious danger of ending. Celtic slumped to back-to-back league defeats for the first time since 2023 thanks to second-half goals by Alexandros Kyziridis and Lawrence Shankland.

arts.ttl: Hearts show Brendan Rodgers what a a Ferrari really looks like as Celtic turn into Hotline laughing stock
arts.sum: Andy Newport takes your calls after Celtic fell even further behind Hearts in the title race

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers tells Celtic fans 'this is my responsibility' as he spots one positive in Hearts horror show
arts.sum: The Hoops crashed to a damaging 3-1 defeat at Tynecastle with Hearts soaring eight points clear

arts.ttl: Hearts 3 Celtic 1: Derek McInnes's men surge eight points clear at top of Premiership
arts.sum: Hearts surged eight points clear of Celtic at the top of the Premiership table with a convincing win over the defending champions at Tynecastle today.

arts.ttl: HEARTS 3 CELTIC 1: CAPITULATION IN THE CAPITAL
arts.sum: HEARTS 3 CELTIC 1 CELTIC got lost in a blunderland as they capitulated in the capital to Hearts this afternoon. The champions now trail the Edinburgh side by an extraordinary EIGHT points so early in the campaign and they were turned over on this occasion – their second consecutive loss in a week – due [...]

arts.ttl: Hearts slap sorry Celtic about as sizzling Kyziridis turns champions into chumps – 5 talking points
arts.sum: It’s now an eight-point deficit and nothing is happening to silence alarm bells in Glasgow's east end.

arts.ttl: Hearts stun Celtic to move eight points clear in Scottish Premiership
arts.sum: Hearts showed they might just be title contenders as they stunned Celtic to move eight points clear at the top of the Premiership.

arts.ttl: Video: Dane Murray nightmare continues as Hearts score twice
arts.sum: Dane Murray is having an afternoon to forget in the Hoops. After being given the nod ahead of Auston Trusty in the centre of defence. After a catastrophic own goal, it had been hoped that the 22-year-old may have banished the first half demons. Unfortunately, in the early stages of the second half, Murray pulled Read More
